sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PDLaneService</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>PDLaneService</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PDLaneService = Class.create();
PDLaneService.prototype = {
    initialize: function(opts) {
        this.repository = (opts && opts.repository) || new PDLaneRepository();
    },
    type: 'PDLaneService',
    insertLanes: function(lanes) {
        return (lanes || []).map(function(fields) {
            return this.repository.insertLane(fields);
        }.bind(this));
    },
    updateLanes: function(lanes, processSchemaVersion) {
        return (lanes || []).map(function(fields) {
            var copiedFields = PDUtils.shallowClone(fields);
            copiedFields.processSchemaVersion = processSchemaVersion;
            return this.repository.updateLane(copiedFields);
        }.bind(this));
    },
    deleteLanes: function(laneIds) {
        this.repository.deleteLanes((laneIds || []).join(','));
    }
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-01-21 00:05:13</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>41907a0977e0a1108188ceec8e5a9977</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PDLaneService</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Process Automation Designer Core - Model" source="com.glide.pad.core.model">0ae817db47220210cd4e1ce4316d431f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_41907a0977e0a1108188ceec8e5a9977</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-04-10 18:31:48</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
